Package com.arangodb

Interface ArangoViewAsync

All Superinterfaces:
ArangoSerdeAccessor
All Known Subinterfaces:
ArangoSearchAsync, SearchAliasAsync
All Known Implementing Classes:
ArangoSearchAsyncImpl, ArangoViewAsyncImpl, SearchAliasAsyncImpl
@ThreadSafe public interface ArangoViewAsync extends ArangoSerdeAccessor
Asynchronous version of ArangoView
